content.en: Differential equation algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms in solving differential equations. These algorithms, such as regression-based neural networks, Legendre neural network methods, and extreme learning machine algorithms, are being used to tackle various types of differential equations. By combining these algorithms with neural network models and optimization techniques, scientists are making progress in solving both ordinary and partial differential equations.
content.da: Differentialligningsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at løse differentialligninger. Disse algoritmer, såsom regressionsbaserede neurale netværk, Legendre neurale netværksmetoder og algoritmer til ekstreme læringsmaskiner, anvendes til at tackle forskellige typer af differentialligninger. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med neurale netværksmodeller og optimeringsteknikker gør videnskabsfolk fremskridt i løsningen af både ordinære og partielle differentialligninger.
